page.title: 07Travel and employment
page.content: Shevington Vale housing estate in Appley Bridge is situated in a rural locality, several miles from the nearest town. A part of our survey sought to find out where the residents worked and the distances they travelled. (For details of distribution and %return of questionnaire see page 6). These were the findings:- 253 people (42%) do not travel out of Shevington Vale to work - they either work in the area, are housewives, retired or unemployed. 344 people (58%) do travel out of the area to work and the distances were calculated with the following results:- 0 to 5 miles.....25% 5 to 10m....13% 10 to 15m........14% 15 to 20m.0.05% More than 20 miles...............0.09%
